results.content: I like the teacher's style, her dynamism. However the explanations are somewhat confusing. To me the material would have been easier to understand if the teacher had first explained the concepts on a simpler  structure and then appy them on a real project.

results.content:
Excellently awesome! The instructor makes everything simple as ABC by treating what should and what shouldn't be done and stating why. Now I don't have to worry so much about adjusting to what every new update of Bootstrap comes with.

I highly recommend it to everyone that wants to take absolute control of the responsiveness of their websites without depending on external input.
